homepage.title: The Coding School
homepage.description: Empowering the next generation to become problem solvers and future leaders through code

about.title: About Us
about.description: Learn about our mission, who we are, what we do, and why we do it.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Our team is comprised of 500+ of the most passionate computer science university students and professional software engineers from around the United States. From over 40 universities and 20 companies, our teachers study at MIT, UCLA, Ole Miss, and Duke; work at Bain, IBM, SpaceX and Facebook; and have served in the military, written code for life-saving procedures used by poison control centers, and sent satellites up into space.

getInvolved.title: Get Involved
getInvolved.description: Giving the gift of coding not only impacts the lives of the students involved, it has the potential to change the world.
